name: Sebastian Böcker
content: Lehrstuhl für Bioinformatik an der FSU Jena, Prof. Böcker Skip to content Foto: Jens Meyer Head: Prof. Dr. Sebastian Böcker Office hours: nach Vereinbarung Postal Address Friedrich-Schiller-Universität Jena Institut für Informatik Lehrstuhl für Bioinformatik Inselplatz 5 07743 Jena Secretariat Kathrin Schowtka Room: 3012 Phone: +49-3641-9-46450 Fax: +49-3641-9-46452 Office hours: Monday-Friday, 7:30-16:00 This is the home page of the Boecker lab, headed by Prof. Sebastian Böcker. For e-mail or phone contact to a particular member of the chair see the members page. Follow us on Social Media Links We are part of the HUMAN doctoral network (Harmonising and Unifying Blood Metabolomic Analysis Networks) funded by EU Horizon. We are part of an ongoing project regarding the identification of pharmacologically active molecules using AS-MS (affinity selection-mass spectrometry). This project is supported by the Thüringer Ministerium für Wirtschaft, Wissenschaft und Digitale Gesellschaft (TMWWDG) with funds from the European Union (ERDF, 2023 VFE 0003). Read more We are cooperating with the International Max Planck Research School “Chemical Communication in Ecological Systems” at the Max Planck Institute for Chemical Ecology (Jena) and the International Max Planck Research School for Global Biogeochemical Cycles at the Max Planck Institute for Biogeochemistry (Jena) The Bio Systems Analysis research group of Prof. Dr. Peter Dittrich is an independent research group which is also part of this Chair. BioinfoWelten: Aktuelle Forschung verständlich erklärt. How to find us Look at the map on Google Maps. Getting there by train: You will arrive either at Jena Westbahnhof or at Jena Paradies. Click on one of the links to find walking directions to our offices, walking distance is about 15 minutes. The main entrance (“Eingang Lutherplatz”) is at the intersection of Löbdergraben and Lutherplatz. Take the elevator on the right, press 3, the secretariat is on the right.
